m_szDocSumamry: Do green vehicles make sense for the average consumer? Ross McLaughlin and Lisa Green, CTV Vancouver Published Thursday, March 24, 2016 5:41PM PDT Last Updated Thursday, March 24, 2016 7:05PM PDT If you’re thinking of a green vehicle, there’s no better time than now. Incentives are up as B.C. pushes hard to get more electric, hybrid and fuel cell vehicles on the road and there are more choices on the market than ever.
